questions.question: What is the basic structural and functional unit of life?
questions.explanation: The cell is the basic structural and functional unit of life.

questions.question: Which part of the cell controls all its activities?
questions.explanation: The nucleus controls all activities of the cell.

questions.question: Which part of the plant cell is not found in animal cells?
questions.explanation: The cell wall is present only in plant cells.

questions.question: What is the jelly-like substance inside the cell called?
questions.explanation: Cytoplasm is the jelly-like substance inside the cell.

questions.question: Which part of the cell allows substances to enter or leave the cell?
questions.explanation: The cell membrane controls the movement of substances.

questions.question: What is the function of chloroplasts in plant cells?
Which cell part stores food, water, and waste?
questions.explanation: The vacuole stores food, water, and waste.

questions.question: What is the function of mitochondria?
questions.explanation: Mitochondria are known as the powerhouse of the cell.

questions.question: Which of the following is a unicellular organism?
questions.explanation: Amoeba is made up of a single cell.

questions.question: What is the function of the cell wall?
questions.explanation: The cell wall provides shape and protection to plant cells.
